info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 19 at 11:23AM CDT until September 19 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis TN
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...Portions of East Arkansas, including the following county, Phillips and North Mississippi, including the following county, Coahoma.
* WHEN...Until 230 PM CDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Dangerous flows over low-water crossings.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1123 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Clarksdale, Elaine, Sherard, Crumrod, Green Grove, Rena Lara, Hillhouse, Modoc, Farrell, Hoop Spur, Bobo, Ratio, Beverly, Mellwood, Catron, Lundell, Mosby Spur and Ferguson. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON
